oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Implicit enthalpy formulation of phase-change problems on unstructured grid
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CALDWELL, J
DATE, AW
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: heat-transfer
solidification
phase-change problems
unstructured grid
enthalpy formulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper presents an implicit finite-volume enthalpy formulation of the multidimensional phase-change problems involving a unique phase-change temperature. The derived formulation provides a simple method for local tracking of interface using the enthalpy variable on both structured as well as unstructured grids in a novel way. Results of economic computations of previously published problems are presented. Copyright (C) 2003 John Wiley Sons, Ltd.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: COMMUNICATIONS IN NUMERICAL METHODS IN ENGINEERING, 19(11), 865-875
